h.b: ㄖㄣˊ　ㄨˊ　ㄩㄢˇ　ㄌㄩˋ，ㄅㄧˋ　ㄧㄡˇ　ㄐㄧㄣˋ　ㄧㄡ

English: He who gives no thought to far-flung problems soon finds suffering nearby (idiom, from Analects).
Smug concentration on the here and now will lead to future sorrow.
